Articles.Content:
I\'ve been a fan of Kerbal space program since the demo, and have came and gone from it, and today I finally started posting on the forums

This is Awesome.

I\'m having a ball with plugins, and I\'m here to stay. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

DFTBA

Hi Felix, welcome to the community.

KSP\'s plugins are awesome as you say, maybe we\'ll see some cool plugins from you eh? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
WHat code does KSP use? C++? Hah, good luck with that! Thanks anyway. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I\'m pretty sure KSP uses C# for the plugins, as it uses Mono for a lot of cross platform compatibility, C# is supposed to be a lot more forgiving than C or C++
While it is less forgiving.. Making a plugin would probably take month of solid study in the Language. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

That\'s true, I know I can\'t just pick up something like that, I struggled with Basic ;D

But that\'s just another thing that makes KSP awesome, we can build anything we want, fly to the moon, or just tinker with meshes and code if that\'s our thing.

If you haven\'t already seen them try out [Damned robotics](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10662.0) and [Damned aerospace](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10138.0), they really open up the possibilities ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That\'s true, I know I can\'t just pick up something like that, I struggled with Basic ;D
> 
> But that\'s just another thing that makes KSP awesome, we can build anything we want, fly to the moon, or just tinker with meshes and code if that\'s our thing.
> 
> If you haven\'t already seen them try out [Damned robotics](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10662.0) and [Damned aerospace](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10138.0), they really open up the possibilities ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![disgusted-mother-of-god.png?1321272571](http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/199/693/disgusted-mother-of-god.png?1321272571)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

PS: A friendly reminder, posting reaction/meme images alone is against the rules. Since you\'re new here, I\'ll just leave it at that.

> 
> Welcome to the KSP Forums!
> 
> Happy Launching!
> 
> Arrr!
> 
> Capt\'n Skunky
> 
> KSP Community Manager
> 
> PS: A friendly reminder, posting reaction/meme images alone is against the rules. Since you\'re new here, I\'ll just leave it at that.

Sorry! but\'d it\'d be okay if I put it in a spoiler and some text?

> 
> Sorry! but\'d it\'d be okay if I put it in a spoiler and some text?

That would be fine, but a quote and a reaction image isn\'t really good content. We expect more from our members, after all, they\'re rocket scientists! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

(Well, we all at least pretend to be)

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
